BasicInfo.short: Conference Hound is a global conference discovery platform that facilitates information on conferences held in cities across the US.

Products.name: Conference Discovery
Products.description: Conference Discovery was added to CrunchBase in 2013

Products.name: Conference Hound Marketing Services
Products.description: Conference Hound provides a variety of automated and custom services to help conference organizers promote their events.

Products.description: Conference Hound Advertising was launched in 2011
